problems.description: Implement the radix sort algorithm for the given input array
problems.inputs description: Input consists of an array of unsorted array. It may be of arbitrary length.
problems.expected description: An array of numbers e.g. 1,2,4,5 sorted in ascending orders

problems.description: Modify the Radix Sort algorithm to sort a list of floating-point numbers. Assume that the number of decimal places is fixed for all numbers in the list.
problems.inputs description: Input consists of an array of unsorted floating-point numbers - inp1. It may be of arbitrary length.
problems.expected description: An array of floating-point numbers sorted in ascending order.

problems.description: Modify the Radix Sort algorithm to sort a list of floating-point numbers. The number of decimal places can vary between numbers in the list.
problems.inputs description: Input consists of an array of unsorted floating-point numbers with varying decimal places.
problems.expected description: An array of floating-point numbers sorted in ascending order.
